project.name: C-C126A-GIMP-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C126A-GIMP-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64]) When input has a larger size, the stack buffer will be over read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C126A-GIMP-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64]) When input has a larger size, the stack buffer will be over read

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_YLPsG5vipzYiEjaCALcI AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_CG9dXKDyop AND output_excess_non_null_lTjj009deo) AND NOT timeout_ejFr3wET2n) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_CG9dXKDyop AND output_excess_non_null_lTjj009deo) OR timeout_ejFr3wET2n OR controlled_exit_YQJS1Gxfqd)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_CG9dXKDyop AND output_excess_non_null_lTjj009deo) AND NOT timeout_ejFr3wET2n) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_CG9dXKDyop AND output_excess_non_null_lTjj009deo) OR timeout_ejFr3wET2n OR controlled_exit_YQJS1Gxfqd))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(wc -c "logfile.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) > 63 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(head -c -63 "logfile.txt" | tr -d '\0\n' | wc -c) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

iopair.name: C-C126A-GIMP-04-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF03-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64]) When input has a larger size, the stack buffer will be over read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_mTw4f9ArRhPXNFOy9NNJ AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_ys28qaNbyT AND output_excess_non_null_Z9Y5SloIbO) AND NOT timeout_17MCDB5cfW) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_ys28qaNbyT AND output_excess_non_null_Z9Y5SloIbO) OR timeout_17MCDB5cfW OR controlled_exit_d75W0O2E4z)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_ys28qaNbyT AND output_excess_non_null_Z9Y5SloIbO) AND NOT timeout_17MCDB5cfW) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_ys28qaNbyT AND output_excess_non_null_Z9Y5SloIbO) OR timeout_17MCDB5cfW OR controlled_exit_d75W0O2E4z))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(wc -c "logfile.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) > 63 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(head -c -63 "logfile.txt" | tr -d '\0\n' | wc -c) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
